�Hedge�       �Thug-bot�       �Sniper�



   Thug-bot walked back and forth in his cell.  Has Hedge figured out that 
he bombed the ship.  If she found outm what was going to be his punishment.  
He was surley going to be put to death, but was it going to be quick or 
painful.

   Suddenly the door in the far side of room open and in walked Hedge.  She 
walked towards the cell.

   "I checked my tapes and I found out you did it."  Hedge said.

   "I didn't do nuthin'"  Thug-bot said.

   "I know what you did, If you Admit it your punishment won't be servere."  
Hedge says.

   "Okay, I did it.  There.  I bombed the ship."  Thug-bot says.

   "Ohh I was talking anout that food fight at lunch.  But since you bombed 
the ship, I have come up with a punishment.  Before we got here, there was a 
transmission from the IGL.  I shall enter you into it.  If you win, you 
shall be forgiven for the bomb, but if you lose, you die." Hedge says.

   "Okay."  Thug-bot says.

   Hedge walks out the room.  While she walks she turns on her comm.  
"Sniper, Send a message to the IGL stating that Thug-bot shall enter the 
Regular Divison.  Ohh yeah, and Send a message on all frequincies asking for 
the leaders of factions to contact us."

   "Yes ma'm" Sniper says over the Comm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

   Sniper turns on the Comm to the IGL.  "Hello, this is Sniper of the 
Cybertron Mob.  We wish to enter on of our own into your Regular Division.  
His name is Thug-bot.  Thank You."  Sniper turned off the Channel to the IGL 
then he turned on a Channel on all frequincies, "Hello, I am a soilder Of 
the Cybertron Mob, here in the Subcontinent on India.  We would like to talk 
to the leaders of all the faction for intrest in an alliance."  Sniper turns 
off the Channel.
